jobDescription: As a Data Engineer in our Chief Data Office organization you'll be responsible for interpreting the requirements of various big data analytic use cases and scenarios. As an integral member of our dynamic team, you'll have an opportunity to develop the necessary enablers and data platforms in the data lake environment and have responsibility for maintaining data integrity during the life cycle phases.
